name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tanjiro Kamado Demon Slayer Live Wallpaper Chrome Extension

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Experience the world of Tanjiro Kamado from Demon Slayer with this captivating Chrome extension.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Featuring stunning live wallpapers of Tanjiro in his heroic moments, this extension brings his unwavering determination and strength to your browser every time you open a new tab.

Features:
🎨 High-quality live wallpaper of Tanjiro Kamado from Demon Slayer.
🌐 Customizable search bar to use your preferred search engine.
🕒 Clock and date display for a functional and stylish browsing experience.
🔗 Quick-access shortcuts to your favorite websites for easy navigation.
Let Tanjiro’s courage and kindness inspire your day with this dynamic live wallpaper, perfect for Demon Slayer fans looking to bring the power of Tanjiro’s journey to their browser.

More extensions: https://haberikra.com/
Contact us: https://haberikra.com/contact-us/
Privacy policy: https://haberikra.com/privacy-policy/
